item.title: Content Marketer - Upwork
item.description:
About Us

Filmatic AI is a tech startup that develops AI tools for editing in the filmmaking industry and for content creators. Our core product can match color between any two cameras. We have additional products in the roadmap that aim to enhance the quality of footage from digital video cameras. We are a small, nimble team open to new strategies and execute quickly on asset development, as our team is comprised of cinematographers.

Qualifications

Demonstrated track record of success in turning content into traffic, engaging and educating audiences, and creating content that converts prospects into customers
Familiarity with best practices for SEO and experience writing for and/or managing social media channels
Entrepreneurial-minded, with a high sense of urgency, dedication, and drive to succeed
Responsibilities

This position requires a combination of content creation, creativity, strategy, and analytical skills to define and optimize content engagement across channels (Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, TikTok, Email, etc.)
You will define our content calendar and collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop content strategies and executions

Hourly Range: $20.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 14:33 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Content Writing, Marketing Strategy, Social Media Marketing, Content Marketing, Marketing
Skills: Content Writing, Marketing Strategy, Social Media Marketing, Content Marketing, Marketing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: UGC Video Content Creator (Must Show Face on Camera) - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a UGC creator who will record themselves reviewing an AI Software. The script will be provided. The video will be MAX 60 seconds long. There is NO editing required.

How it will work:
1) Please apply to this upwork job if you think you are a good fit
2) If chosen, we will send you an upwork contract to accept + the script
3) You will record yourself
4) You'll send us the raw video files once you are done filming

Very important: Aside from just recording yourself acting out the script, we will also need a few simple b-roll shots of you at your computer pretending you are using the software.

Budget: $65
Posted On: June 21, 2024 14:23 UTC
Category: Acting
Skills:UGC, TikTok Video, Videography
Skills: UGC, TikTok Video, Videography
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Videographer and Editor Needed in Las Vegas for Non-Profit - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled videographer in Las Vegas to film interviews with our non-profit client in the next couple of. The ideal candidate will have experience in capturing high-quality footage and audio. After filming, you will be responsible for editing the video together with other elements captured from previous events. Attention to detail and the ability to meet deadlines are crucial in this role.   

Script is already approved and ready to film.

Skills required:
- Videography
- Video editing
- Attention to detail
- Ability to meet deadlines
- Capable of being client-facing and handling asking interview questions.

We are aiming to have the video completed and uploaded for a July 19th website launch. If you do not edit, please let us know as we have other editors available but would prefer a single team to work with. Looking to have a vendor determined next week (June 24-28), filming the following week or next (July 1- 12), should only be one day of filming. There may be a location scout needed beforehand to find a viable location for the interviews. Editing and finalizing the video the next week (July 15-19).

Dates can have some flexibility but we're trying to stay within this schedule if at all possible. Video will also have some windows where we'll be waiting for client approvals so that may cause adjustments to schedule.

Thanks so much!

Budget: $1,500
Posted On: June 21, 2024 14:22 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Video Editing, Videography, Video Production, Camera
Skills: Video Editing, Videography, Video Production, Camera
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
